org.apache.river.test.support

Class MulticastOverrideProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.support.MulticastOverrideProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, OverrideProvider

    public class MulticastOverrideProvider
extends Object
implements OverrideProvider
    An OverrideProvider which generates an override string for the entries:
    • net.jini.discovery.LookupDiscovery.multicastAnnouncementInterval
    • org.apache.river.reggie.multicastAnnouncementInterval if the service name is net.jini.core.lookup.ServiceRegistrar
    • multicast.ttl is the test run is non-distributed
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      String[] getOverrides(QAConfig config, String serviceName, int index)
      If the test property "net.jini.discovery.announce" is defined, use its value to generate the override strings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MulticastOverrideProvider

        public MulticastOverrideProvider()

    • Method Detail

      • getOverrides

        public String[] getOverrides(QAConfig config,
                             String serviceName,
                             int index)
                      throws TestException
        If the test property "net.jini.discovery.announce" is defined, use its value to generate the override strings. For all values of serviceName including null, an override for net.jini.discovery.LookupDiscovery.multicastAnnouncementInterval is generated. If serviceName is net.jini.core.lookup.ServiceRegistrar then an additional override is generated for org.apache.river.reggie.multicastAnnouncementInterval. If the test run is NOT distributed then an override is generated for multicast.ttl to set it to zero.
        Specified by:
        getOverrides in interface OverrideProvider
        Parameters:
        config - the test config
        serviceName - the name of the service to generate overrides for
        index - the service instance count
        Returns:
        an array of override strings, or a zero-length array if there are no overrides.
        Throws:
        TestException - if the value of the announce test property is non-numeric
